doc:
Sam Riegel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Riegel 0 Samuel Brent Oscar Riegel (born October 9, 1976), also known as Sam Regal, or Jack Lingo, is an American voice actor, writer and director who appears in cartoons, anime and video game series. He voiced Donatello in the 2003 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles series, Phoenix Wright in the Ace Attorney video game series, Shiro Emiya in the Fate/stay night series, Taniguchi in The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya and Mephisto Pheles in the Blue Exorcist series. Samuel_Brent_Oscar_Riegel ( born October_9_,_1976 ) , also_known as Sam_Regal , or Jack_Lingo , is an_American_voice_actor , writer_and_director who appears in cartoons_,_anime_and_video_game_series . He voiced Donatello in the_2003_Teenage_Mutant_Ninja_Turtles_series , Phoenix_Wright in the_Ace_Attorney_video_game_series , Shiro_Emiya in the_Fate/stay_night_series , Taniguchi in The_Melancholy of Haruhi_Suzumiya and Mephisto_Pheles in the_Blue_Exorcist_series .
